name: Artifact Sync Integration
description: Integration tests for git-backed artifact management against a real GitHub remote. Creates an ephemeral public repo per test run.

scenarios.name: Export + Push to GitHub
scenarios.description: Export deployed channels via ArtifactController, push to GitHub, verify decomposed file tree in remote clone

scenarios.name: Git Status + Log via API
scenarios.description: Verify git status and log match between ArtifactController and independent clone

scenarios.name: Clone + Import from GitHub
scenarios.description: Clone remote repo, initialize separate ArtifactController, import channels, verify round-trip fidelity

scenarios.name: Modify + Delta Detection
scenarios.description: Modify a channel file in git, commit+push, verify DeltaDetector identifies the correct changed channel

scenarios.name: Multi-Branch Promotion
scenarios.description: Create dev and staging branches, export to dev, promote to staging via PromotionPipeline

scenarios.name: Sensitive Data Masking
scenarios.description: Export with maskSecrets=true, verify credentials replaced with ${} variable placeholders

scenarios.name: Structural Diff via API
scenarios.description: Modify channel XML, run ChannelDiff against git version, verify diff result has changes

scenarios.name: Dependency Graph
scenarios.description: Query dependency graph via ArtifactController and REST API, verify structure
